node.title: MetService's Napier weather forecasts to return soon
node.description: Napier residents have not been able to get real time weather conditions from the country's main weather forecast provider during the heat of summer.
node.content:
["Napier residents have not been able to get real time weather conditions from the country's main weather forecast provider during the heat of summer.", "", "
Thermometer displaying high 30 degree temperatures on a sun summer day. Photo: 123rf
", "For the last few weeks, there has been no current temperature for the Hawke's Bay city when people look at the MetService website or app.", "MetService meteorologist Peter Little said this was because the weather station in the city centre was not working.", ""Unfortunately, our weather station at Napier city, which is near McLean Park, that's actually stopped reporting.", ""The good news is we have some technicians which are expected to repair it later this week."", "However, forecasters are able to use the area's other station at Napier Airport to find the latest temperature and predict the weather."]
